short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds ChatGPT results alongside Google search results.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ChatGPT Assistant for Web Search is a cutting-edge browser extension that harnesses the power of OpenAI's ChatGPT to revolutionize your search experience, providing you with AI-generated answers, insights, and suggestions directly on the search results page.

Key Features:

Seamless Integration: The ChatGPT Assistant effortlessly works with popular search engines like Google, adding an intuitive chat interface alongside your search results. This allows you to engage in a dynamic and interactive manner with the AI, helping you find the information you seek quickly and easily.

AI-Powered Answers: Driven by OpenAI's advanced language model, ChatGPT, the extension processes your search query and generates accurate, reliable, and detailed answers. This not only saves you time by eliminating the need to sift through multiple web pages but also empowers you with a deeper understanding of the subject matter.

Interactive Conversations: Ask follow-up questions, clarify doubts, and request additional information through the chat interface. ChatGPT Assistant facilitates an engaging and interactive search experience, simulating a conversation with a knowledgeable AI companion.

User-Friendly Interface: The clean, minimalistic, and intuitive design ensures a smooth and enjoyable user experience. The ChatGPT Assistant helps you focus on getting the information you need without any distractions or unnecessary clutter.

Secure and Private: Your API key and search queries are stored locally on your device, ensuring that your data privacy is maintained. The extension does not share your data with any third parties.

Customizable Options: Configure the extension to use your own ChatGPT API key and manage other settings (coming soon) to personalize your experience. Tailor the ChatGPT Assistant to your preferences for a truly unique search experience.

To begin, simply install the ChatGPT Assistant for Web Search extension, provide your ChatGPT API key, and enjoy a smarter, more efficient, and engaging search experience that will change the way you interact with the internet.

Note: This extension requires a valid ChatGPT API key, which can be obtained from the OpenAI website. Usage of the ChatGPT API may be subject to OpenAI's pricing and usage limits. Please ensure you are aware of these limitations before using the extension.
